item.title: US-191 North at UT-313
item.description: US-191 North at UT-313. UT-313 is signed as a Utah Scenic Byway. UT-313 connects US-191 with Dead Horse Point State Park, and the Island in the Sky unit of Canyonlands.

item.title: US-191 North Approaching UT-313
item.description: US-191 north approaching UT-313. Continue north on US-191 north for I-70.

item.title: US-191 North Approaching UT-313
item.description: US-191 north approaching UT-313. Use UT-313 west for Dead Horse Point State Park, and Canyonlands National Park (Island In The Sky Unit).

item.title: End UT-313 North at US-191
item.description: End UT-313 north at US-191. US-191 shields are incorrectly signed as UT-191.

item.title: End UT-313 at US-191
item.description: End UT-313 north approaching US-191. Use US-191 north for I-70. Use US-191 south for Moab.

item.title: UT-313 East at Canyonlands National Park
item.description: UT-313 east at Canyonlands NP access road.

item.title: UT-313 at Canyonlands National Park Jct.
item.description: UT-313 north approaching Canyonlands NP access road. Turn right to continue on UT-313 to US-191.
